name: Lego Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled
summary: The Avengers are forced to "party" with Ultron when he seeks to disassemble the team by taking control of Iron Man's armor and enact a nefarious scheme to take over the world.
info:
• 中文名: 乐高漫威复仇者联盟:重新集结
  • 上映年度: 2015
  • 片长: 22 minutes
  • Copyright: Marvel Entertainment
